articles.title: A Sikh man's murder at a gas station revealed another tragedy of 9/11 - CNN
articles.description: When Balbir Singh Sodhi was killed outside his gas station four days after 9/11, it was just the beginning of more hate and violence to come for Sikhs, Muslims, Arabs and South Asians. Twenty years later, the nation has yet to fully reckon with the impact.
articles.content: A charcoal portrait of Balbir Singh Sodhi is displayed in his brother Rana Singh Sodhis home in Mesa, Arizona. Balbir was murdered after 9/11 in a supposed act of retaliation.Mesa, Arizona Sukhwinder… [+17959 chars]

articles.title: Veiled protest: Afghan women rally in support of the Taliban - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: Afghan women wearing full face veils sat in rows at a Kabul university lecture theatre Saturday, pledging commitment to the Taliban's hardline policie
